11#include "api/video/video_frame_buffer.h"
12
13#include "api/video/i420_buffer.h"
14#include "api/video/nv12_buffer.h"
15#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
16
17namespace webrtc {
18
19rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer> VideoFrameBuffer::CropAndScale(
20 int offset_x,
21 int offset_y,
22 int crop_width,
23 int crop_height,
24 int scaled_width,
25 int scaled_height) {
26 rtc::scoped_refptr<I420Buffer> result =
27 I420Buffer::Create(scaled_width, scaled_height);
28 result->CropAndScaleFrom(*this->ToI420(), offset_x, offset_y, crop_width,
29 crop_height);
30 return result;
31}
32
33const I420BufferInterface* VideoFrameBuffer::GetI420() const {
34 // Overridden by subclasses that can return an I420 buffer without any
35 // conversion, in particular, I420BufferInterface.
36 return nullptr;
37}
38
39const I420ABufferInterface* VideoFrameBuffer::GetI420A() const {
40 RTC_CHECK(type() == Type::kI420A);
41 return static_cast<const I420ABufferInterface*>(this);
42}
43
44const I444BufferInterface* VideoFrameBuffer::GetI444() const {
45 RTC_CHECK(type() == Type::kI444);
46 return static_cast<const I444BufferInterface*>(this);
47}
48
49const I010BufferInterface* VideoFrameBuffer::GetI010() const {
50 RTC_CHECK(type() == Type::kI010);
51 return static_cast<const I010BufferInterface*>(this);
52}
53
54const NV12BufferInterface* VideoFrameBuffer::GetNV12() const {
55 RTC_CHECK(type() == Type::kNV12);
56 return static_cast<const NV12BufferInterface*>(this);
57}
58
59rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer> VideoFrameBuffer::GetMappedFrameBuffer(
60 rtc::ArrayView<Type> types) {
61 RTC_CHECK(type() == Type::kNative);
62 return nullptr;
63}
64
65VideoFrameBuffer::Type I420BufferInterface::type() const {
66 return Type::kI420;
67}
68
69const char* VideoFrameBufferTypeToString(VideoFrameBuffer::Type type) {
70 switch (type) {
71 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kNative:
72 return "kNative";
73 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420:
74 return "kI420";
75 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI420A:
76 return "kI420A";
77 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI444:
78 return "kI444";
79 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kI010:
80 return "kI010";
81 case VideoFrameBuffer::Type::kNV12:
82 return "kNV12";
83 default:
84 RTC_NOTREACHED();
85 }
86}
87
88int I420BufferInterface::ChromaWidth() const {
89 return (width() + 1) / 2;
90}
91
92int I420BufferInterface::ChromaHeight() const {
93 return (height() + 1) / 2;
94}
95
96rtc::scoped_refptr<I420BufferInterface> I420BufferInterface::ToI420() {
97 return this;
98}
99
100const I420BufferInterface* I420BufferInterface::GetI420() const {
101 return this;
102}
103
104VideoFrameBuffer::Type I420ABufferInterface::type() const {
105 return Type::kI420A;
106}
107
108VideoFrameBuffer::Type I444BufferInterface::type() const {
109 return Type::kI444;
110}
111
112int I444BufferInterface::ChromaWidth() const {
113 return width();
114}
115
116int I444BufferInterface::ChromaHeight() const {
117 return height();
118}
119
120VideoFrameBuffer::Type I010BufferInterface::type() const {
121 return Type::kI010;
122}
123
124int I010BufferInterface::ChromaWidth() const {
125 return (width() + 1) / 2;
126}
127
128int I010BufferInterface::ChromaHeight() const {
129 return (height() + 1) / 2;
130}
131
132VideoFrameBuffer::Type NV12BufferInterface::type() const {
133 return Type::kNV12;
134}
135
136int NV12BufferInterface::ChromaWidth() const {
137 return (width() + 1) / 2;
138}
139
140int NV12BufferInterface::ChromaHeight() const {
141 return (height() + 1) / 2;
142}
143
144rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer> NV12BufferInterface::CropAndScale(
145 int offset_x,
146 int offset_y,
147 int crop_width,
148 int crop_height,
149 int scaled_width,
150 int scaled_height) {
151 rtc::scoped_refptr<NV12Buffer> result =
152 NV12Buffer::Create(scaled_width, scaled_height);
153 result->CropAndScaleFrom(*this, offset_x, offset_y, crop_width, crop_height);
154 return result;
155}
156
157} // namespace webrtc
